#include <iostream>
#include <map>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	
	
	int t;
	int n, temp_n;
	long int arr, ans, max;
	map<int, long int> mp;
	int i;
	scanf("%d", &t);
	
	while(t--) {
		
		scanf("%d", &n);
		
		if(n % 2 == 0) {
			temp_n = n/2;
		} else {
			temp_n = n/2;
			temp_n = temp_n + 1;
		}
		
		for(i = 0; i < n; i++) {
			
			scanf("%ld", &arr);
			mp[arr]++;
		}
		
		map<int, long int> :: iterator it = mp.begin();
		max = 0;
		for(;it != mp.end(); it++) {
			
			if(it -> second >= temp_n) {
				if(max < it -> second) {
					max = it -> second;
					ans = it -> first;
				}
			}
		}
		
		cout << ans << endl;
		
	}
	
	return 0;
	
}
